mapper.sql: ID, A0100, B0100, YSP_ID, YSPDW_ID, AGE, POLITICAL_AFF, JOB, HEALTH, SFSMRY, SMDJ, NSSJ, YSMDJ1, YTMJSSJ1, YSMDJ2, YTMJSSJ2, ZTDW, ZTNRZW, CGSJ, HGSJ, SDGJ, TLSJ, CFRW, CFSY, CGSPDW, PWH, ZYPWH, ZJCGQK, SJCGSJ, SJHGSJ, NFGS, SFYSP, SFZQJWYJ, SCZQJWYJSJ, SFBCZQJWYJ, JWJL, CLSHSFTG, JDCJL, SFZYLD, SFLG, POZNSJD, FMXX, DWJSXS, ZZJL, CXYY, SFTSRY, SFZB, SFBG, SQZT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, SORT_ID, SOURCE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oms_pub_group_pre_approval ( ID, B0100, BAZT, TZMC, TZFZR, TZRS, ZTDW, CGSJ, HGSJ, ZWTLSJ, SDGJ, SDGJTLSJ, TJGJ, TJGJTLSJ, CFRW, PWH, ZYPWH, YQDW, FYLYKZXM, SOURCE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME,SQZT,CFSY ) VALUES ( #{item.id}, #{item.b0100}, #{item.bazt}, #{item.tzmc}, #{item.tzfzr}, #{item.tzrs}, #{item.ztdw}, #{item.cgsj}, #{item.hgsj}, #{item.zwtlsj}, #{item.sdgj}, #{item.sdgjtlsj}, #{item.tjgj}, #{item.tjgjtlsj}, #{item.cgrw}, #{item.pwh}, #{item.zypwh}, #{item.yqdw}, #{item.fylykzxm}, #{item.sorce}, #{item.createUser}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.sqzt}, #{item.cfsy} )
mapper.update:
update oms_pub_group_pre_approval
B0100 = #{b0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BAZT = #{bazt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TZMC = #{tzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TZFZR = #{tzfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TZRS = #{tzrs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ZTDW = #{ztdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CGSJ = #{cgsj,jdbcType=DATE},
HGSJ = #{hgsj,jdbcType=DATE},
ZWTLSJ = #{zwtlsj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SDGJ = #{sdgj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SDGJTLSJ = #{sdgjtlsj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TJGJ = #{tjgj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TJGJTLSJ = #{tjgjtlsj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CFRW = #{cfrw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PWH = #{pwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZYPWH = #{zypwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YQDW = #{yqdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FYLYKZXM = #{fylykzxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOURCE = #{fwlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
SQZT = #{sqzt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CFSY = #{cfsy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT t.SQZT, count( 1 ) num FROM oms_pub_group_pre_approval t WHERE t.BAZT = #{bazt} GROUP BY t.SQZT
